episodes.title: Alex Barnes-Ross “They go after anybody who speaks out about scientology”
episodes.description:
Alex was kicked out of Scientology. He is now using his experiences to raise awareness and has a YouTube, Apostate Alex, a channel dedicated to doing so. 
His is an activist to out the truth, show the abusive practices, himself and others have suffered at the hands of Scientology. There is even a website dedicated to openly attack Alex, trying to stop him and his purpose helping others. 
Alex is fighting the only way he knows how, but using his public platform to help change the law, and signpost anyone in need of help towards The Aftermath Foundation.
A fascinating insight from an expert in the field of Scientology.

Join the community and share your story.

episodes.title: Danielle Chamberlin “These guys will brainwash you”
episodes.description:
Escaping Scientology. 
Danielle’s story is one from a Hollywood movie. What started as an idyllic upbringing in South Africa gradually led to a life being captured and controlled by Scientology for almost 20 years. Indoctrinated through her parents at the age of 6, being abused by step brother’s in her own home, she found herself on L Ron Hubbards ship, on her own at sea by age 11. Although put to work, locked up and punished her hope for a better life kept her sane throughout this time. Listen to Danielle in her own words, as she shares her own truth and campaigns to send a message which may help others out there.

Danielle Chamberlin @zimbabwedawn

For help visit: 
Aftermath Foundation: http://foundation.org
Therapy: https://zariyalufu.com
